name: Lost in Space (itch) (vitorino23)
description:
I hope you enjoy my first game, it's based on asteroids .

Left Column:

Easy difficulty (Fácil): Every 5.000 points you earn a new life.

Medium difficulty(Médio:): Every 10.000 points you earn a new life.

Hard difficulty(Difícil): Every 9.999.999 points you earn a new life.

Right Column:

Easy(Fácil): The speed of asteroids is x1.

Medium(Médio): The speed of asteroids is x2.

Everytime you get the "chest" you get 30 penetrate ammo, they don't destroy after colliding with the asteroids.
